subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets scuffled through seven innings, appearing to squander Shaun Marcum’s best outing of the season, but Ike Davis drove in two runs in a comeback against the Braves.
snippet: The Mets scuffled through seven innings, appearing to squander Shaun Marcum’s best outing of the season, but Ike Davis drove in two runs in a comeback against the Braves.
